sen.j: 朝井家（あさいけ）は、日本の氏族。
sen.e: The Asai family was a Japanese clan.
The Asai family was a Japanese clan.

The original family name was Fujiwara.
The original family name was Fujiwara.
The original family name was Fujiwara.
The family came from Omi Province.

sen.j: 勧修寺門跡坊官、諸大夫の家。
sen.e: The family inherited the official in charge of household of the Kajuji Temple which had connection with the imperial court and the Fujiwara clan, and the low rank official 'shodaibu'.
The family inherited the official position in charge of the household of the Kajuji Temple connected with the imperial court and the Fujiwara clan, and had the low rank official 'shodaibu.'

The asai family was Jigeke.

The family crest was 'Tree bars in a Circle'.

sen.j: 明治に入り士族となった。
sen.e: In the Meiji period, the family ranked as gentry or middle class ex-samurai warrior 'Shizoku'.
